desc: Social Bella Fly Foundation is committed to empowering children with alopecia to be brave and have confidence in their own skin. Breaking Down Beauty Barriers because it’s not how you look, but what’s in your heart. Social Bella Fly Foundation offers educational classes that focuses on building your inner beauty.

layout.text:
Having Alopecia isn't going to stop me from being the person that I am.
"Sophia Isabella del Rosario"
